# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily life in numerous ways. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's a must-have for anyone looking to improve their experience. For this incredible opportunity, I'm extending a special offer of $120 for you to consider. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your lifestyle with our top-tier product! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
